languages.text: "Это все, Ваша Светлость. Дел вам предстоит переделать немало, но это так... затравочка перед настоящими буднями Вольного Торговца. Скоро вам предстоит взять в руки бразды правления протекторатом фон Валанциус..." {n}Абеляр снова смотрит на вас испытующе, будто оценивая, насколько вы держитесь перед лицом вороха свалившихся проблем. Лицо его немного смягчается, кажется, он готов произнести что-то ободряющее...{/n}

"That is all of it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have a great deal of work ahead of you, but it is a mere taste of the daily burden of a Rogue Trader. Soon you must take up the reins of the von Valancius protectorate..." {n}Abelard gives you another scrutinising look, as if trying to gauge how long you will hold out under this mountain of problems. His face softens slightly, and it seems he is about to offer some words of encouragement—{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это все, Ваша Светлость. Дел вам предстоит переделать немало, но это так... затравочка перед настоящими буднями Вольного Торговца. Скоро вам предстоит взять в руки бразды правления протекторатом фон Валанциус..." {n}Абеляр снова смотрит на вас испытующе, будто оценивая, насколько вы держитесь перед лицом вороха свалившихся проблем. Лицо его немного смягчается, кажется, он готов произнести что-то ободряющее...{/n}

Soon you must take up the reins of the von Valancius trade empire..." {n}Abelard gives you another scrutinising look, as if trying to gauge how long you will hold out under this mountain of problems. His face softens slightly, and it seems he is about to offer some words of encouragement—{/n}

His face softens slightly, and it seems he is about to offer some words of encouragement—{/n}

"That is all of it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have a great deal of work ahead of you, but it is a mere taste of the daily burden of a Rogue Trader. Soon you must take up the reins of the von Valancius trade empire..." {n}Abelard gives you another scrutinising look, as if trying to gauge how long you will hold out under this mountain of problems. His face softens slightly, and it seems he is about to offer some words of encouragement—{/n}

"That is all of it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have a great deal of work ahead of you, but it is a mere taste of the daily burden of a Rogue Trader. Soon you must take up the reins of the von Valancius protectorate..." {n}Abelard gives you another scrutinising look, as if trying to gauge how long you will hold out under this mountain of problems. His face softens slightly, and it seems he is about to offer some words of encouragement—{/n}

languages.text: “就是这些事情了，大人。您有海量的工作要做，但这仅仅是身为行商浪人日常重担的九牛一毛。用不了多久，您就需要亲自管理冯·瓦兰修斯的属地……”{n}阿贝拉德又以审视的眼神打量着你，似乎是在思考你被这么多麻烦事压在身上，还能撑多久。随后，他的脸色缓和了些，似乎想对你说些鼓励的话语——{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is all of it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have a great deal of work ahead of you, but it is a mere taste of the daily burden of a Rogue Trader. Soon you must take up the reins of the von Valancius protectorate..." {n}Abelard gives you another scrutinising look, as if trying to gauge how long you will hold out under this mountain of problems. His face softens slightly, and it seems he is about to offer some words of encouragement—{/n}

traits.locale_text: “就是这些事情了，大人。您有海量的工作要做，但这仅仅是身为行商浪人日常重担的九牛一毛。用不了多久，您就需要亲自管理冯·瓦兰修斯的属地……”{n}阿贝拉德又以审视的眼神打量着你，似乎是在思考你被这么多麻烦事压在身上，还能撑多久。随后，他的脸色缓和了些，似乎想对你说些鼓励的话语——{/n}

languages.text: 「以上です、{mf|陛下|陛下}。あなたには多くの仕事が待ち受けていますが、それはローグトレーダーの日々の重責のほんの一端に過ぎないものです。間もなく、あなたはフォン・ヴァランシウス保護国家の手綱を取らねばならなくなります…」{n}アベラードは、山積する問題に、あなたがいつまで耐えられるかを測っているかのように、また眇めるような眼差しをあなたに向けた。その表情は励ましの言葉をかけようとしているようの、わずかに和らいでいた…{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is all of it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have a great deal of work ahead of you, but it is a mere taste of the daily burden of a Rogue Trader. Soon you must take up the reins of the von Valancius protectorate..." {n}Abelard gives you another scrutinising look, as if trying to gauge how long you will hold out under this mountain of problems. His face softens slightly, and it seems he is about to offer some words of encouragement—{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「以上です、{mf|陛下|陛下}。あなたには多くの仕事が待ち受けていますが、それはローグトレーダーの日々の重責のほんの一端に過ぎないものです。間もなく、あなたはフォン・ヴァランシウス保護国家の手綱を取らねばならなくなります…」{n}アベラードは、山積する問題に、あなたがいつまで耐えられるかを測っているかのように、また眇めるような眼差しをあなたに向けた。その表情は励ましの言葉をかけようとしているようの、わずかに和らいでいた…{/n}

languages.text: "Das wäre alles, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Vor Euch liegt viel Arbeit, aber das ist nur ein Vorgeschmack auf die tägliche Bürde {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin}. Schon bald werdet Ihr die Zügel des Protektorats von Valancius in Händen halten ..." {n}Abelard wirft dir erneut einen prüfenden Blick zu, als wolle er herausfinden, wie lange du diesem Berg von Problemen standhältst. Seine Miene entspannt sich ein wenig, und es sieht aus, als würden nun einige aufmunternde Worte folgen ...{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is all of it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have a great deal of work ahead of you, but it is a mere taste of the daily burden of a Rogue Trader. Soon you must take up the reins of the von Valancius protectorate..." {n}Abelard gives you another scrutinising look, as if trying to gauge how long you will hold out under this mountain of problems. His face softens slightly, and it seems he is about to offer some words of encouragement—{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das wäre alles, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Vor Euch liegt viel Arbeit, aber das ist nur ein Vorgeschmack auf die tägliche Bürde {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin}. Schon bald werdet Ihr die Zügel des Protektorats von Valancius in Händen halten ..." {n}Abelard wirft dir erneut einen prüfenden Blick zu, als wolle er herausfinden, wie lange du diesem Berg von Problemen standhältst. Seine Miene entspannt sich ein wenig, und es sieht aus, als würden nun einige aufmunternde Worte folgen ...{/n}

languages.text: « Voilà tout ce qu'il y avait à savoir, Votre Seigneurie. Vous avez beaucoup de travail, mais ce n'est qu'un avant-goût de l'immense fardeau qui repose sur les épaules {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande}. Bientôt, il vous faudra prendre la tête du protectorat von Valancius... » {n}Abélard vous lance un autre regard scrutateur, comme s'il essayait d'évaluer combien de temps vous allez tenir face à cette montagne de problèmes. Son visage s'adoucit ensuite légèrement, et il semble même sur le point de vous prodiguer quelques mots d'encouragement...{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is all of it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have a great deal of work ahead of you, but it is a mere taste of the daily burden of a Rogue Trader. Soon you must take up the reins of the von Valancius protectorate..." {n}Abelard gives you another scrutinising look, as if trying to gauge how long you will hold out under this mountain of problems. His face softens slightly, and it seems he is about to offer some words of encouragement—{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Voilà tout ce qu'il y avait à savoir, Votre Seigneurie. Vous avez beaucoup de travail, mais ce n'est qu'un avant-goût de l'immense fardeau qui repose sur les épaules {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande}. Bientôt, il vous faudra prendre la tête du protectorat von Valancius... » {n}Abélard vous lance un autre regard scrutateur, comme s'il essayait d'évaluer combien de temps vous allez tenir face à cette montagne de problèmes. Son visage s'adoucit ensuite légèrement, et il semble même sur le point de vous prodiguer quelques mots d'encouragement...{/n}

languages.text: «Eso es todo por ahora, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tiene mucho trabajo por delante, pero esto es una pequeña muestra de las cargas diarias de ser Comerciante Independiente. No tardará en tomar las riendas del protectorado de los von Valancius...». {n}Abelard te dedica otra mirada inquisitiva, como si intentara calcular cuánto podrás aguantar bajo esta inmensa cantidad de problemas. Su expresión se relaja ligeramente y parece estar a punto de darte ánimos...{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is all of it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have a great deal of work ahead of you, but it is a mere taste of the daily burden of a Rogue Trader. Soon you must take up the reins of the von Valancius protectorate..." {n}Abelard gives you another scrutinising look, as if trying to gauge how long you will hold out under this mountain of problems. His face softens slightly, and it seems he is about to offer some words of encouragement—{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Eso es todo por ahora, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tiene mucho trabajo por delante, pero esto es una pequeña muestra de las cargas diarias de ser Comerciante Independiente. No tardará en tomar las riendas del protectorado de los von Valancius...». {n}Abelard te dedica otra mirada inquisitiva, como si intentara calcular cuánto podrás aguantar bajo esta inmensa cantidad de problemas. Su expresión se relaja ligeramente y parece estar a punto de darte ánimos...{/n}

languages.text: "Hepsi bu kadar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Elinizde yapacak çok iş var ancak bir Hür Tacir'in gündelik sorumluluklarının yanında esamesi okunmaz. Yakında von Valancius protektorasının dizginlerini elinize almanız gerekecek." {n}Abelard, bu dağlar kadar soruna ne kadar dayanabileceğini kestirmeye çalışıyormuşçasına seni bir kez daha süzüyor. Yüzü hafifçe yumuşuyor, görünüşe göre cesaret verici sözler söylemek üzere ki...{/n}
languages.original_text: "That is all of it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You have a great deal of work ahead of you, but it is a mere taste of the daily burden of a Rogue Trader. Soon you must take up the reins of the von Valancius protectorate..." {n}Abelard gives you another scrutinising look, as if trying to gauge how long you will hold out under this mountain of problems. His face softens slightly, and it seems he is about to offer some words of encouragement—{/n}

Yakında von Valancius protektorasının dizginlerini elinize almanız gerekecek." {n}Abelard, bu dağlar kadar soruna ne kadar dayanabileceğini kestirmeye çalışıyormuşçasına seni bir kez daha süzüyor. Yüzü hafifçe yumuşuyor, görünüşe göre cesaret verici sözler söylemek üzere ki...{/n}
